game_description: Welcome to our cities.Here, you will embark on an interesting journey of exploration.Here you may see dancing enemies!They are city dancers! Enjoy it. This game is special in gesture recognition attacks.You can use knives, guns, swords and fireballs against enemies.You can also pick up new weapons by hand.When you're good at it, you will have fun!
review_1: This game is the first game to feature multiple gesture-based attack methods.
